jls_nayak1983 wrote:
>
> ...
>
> But I dont want to use this Heritrix-1.10.1.jar. Actually I am
> using Heritrix source. I am directly compiling the Heritrix source
> and running it. I put all the lib\*.jar into classpath. This lib is
> supplied with source. But now I dont have any Heritrix-XXX.jar. So
> what can I do ?
>












Compile the stylesheet into your jar or if no jar, just put 
$HERITRIX_HOME/src/resource/*xsl into your classes directory or add 
$HERITRIX_HOME/src/resource to your '-classpath' command-line list 
(etc.).  Here's where we do the load-off-the-CLASSPATH: 
http://crawler.archive.org/xref/org/archive/crawler/writer/ARCWriterProcessor.html#270.

St.Ack
